oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Captain Robert E. Mayes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Broken ambrotype of Captain Robert E. Mayes, who was born in Robertson County in 1823, and died in 1862. He was commissioned 1st Lieutenant in the 89th Regiment of the Tennessee State Militia on March 22, 1847. He later enlisted in the Confederate Army on October 22, 1861, at Red Springs, Macon County, Tennessee, and was assigned to Company H, 30th Tennessee Infantry. He died while a prisoner of war.
